Articles.Content: who else agrees it would be cool if when launching the engines need to spool up when you fire it and while its spooling, the large plumes of water vapor under the launch pad caused by the engine heat goes everywhere. that would be so awesome. does anyone think they can make a mod for this:cool:
sorry guys by accident i posted in the wrong section

okay since this is an accident i might as well show you this quote from nothke on this thread for the mod HotRockets! which add new particle effects

This is no ordinary launch

http://i.imgur.com/40bGScU.gif
I would love for this to be a thing work should definitely be done on this and i hope it becomes reality

You mean like this?

I can't remember which mod it is/was, (possibly NovaPunch) that had a "smoke generator" part. I attached them radially to a fuel tank attached to launch clamps, and set them to go off as stage 0.

HotRockets was working on this at one point, creating thicker smoke plumes, landing ground effects, and smoke blowing out the side grates of the pad.

EDIT:

You mean like this:

This is no ordinary launch

Edited February 1, 2014 by Captain Sierra

do want!!

(10 char)
meh wants!!!

I will try making one of these, it will have crazy mass and stuff but that will keep it on the pad almost certainly.

This will be a little decoupler type thing that will be, essentially, a flat plate shaped like a quadrangular square to attach to the bottom of a rocket. Then, it can have thrust transforms making ~500 kN of thrust on both sides to counter itself, with a bunch of transforms per side, all assigned smokeTrail_heavy or whatever it is, the SRB exhaust sparks, too, and some other "rocket crap!"

Challenge accepted. >
yeah, thats what i meant

what about a mod that makes the engin smoke colide with the ground and go out the launch pad "exahust" ports (the squares in the side of the pad) like in real life?

ps ill fix spelling when i get home

who else agrees it would be cool if when launching the engines need to spool up when you fire it and while its spooling, the large plumes of water vapor under the launch pad caused by the engine heat goes everywhere. that would be so awesome. does anyone think they can make a mod for this:cool:

Something like this?: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68196-CoolRockets%21-Cryo-and-Launch-Particle-FX

Something like this?: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68196-CoolRockets%21-Cryo-and-Launch-Particle-FX

Not quite like that He mean something like this (which was already quoted several times in this thread

This is no ordinary launch

http://i.imgur.com/40bGScU.gif

Hi, guys, I just wanted to say that Sarbian and me are working on the Particle Overhaul project, that will not only include pad smoke that I posted on reddit, but a bunch of other previously unseen features that are on our list. We will publish it as soon as we have a reliable and optimized enough plugin. Hope the wait will be well worth =)
Awesome Waiting for so many of your add ons to be realsed nothke!
